fields_of_interest: Enlargement, Energy, Environment, Single market, External Relations, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: As part of our coverage of news regarding the Energy Union our representatives follow different activities and events with the aim of providing insight and information to our readers of what is happening regarding European policy developments.
person_in_charge_of_eu_relations: Joao Salviano Graca da Silva Fono Carmo
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Natural Gas World intends to undertake contact with parties relevant to the discussion of natural gas matters, involve them in our publications and to undertake events in Brussels related to natural gas.
goals__remit: Minoils Media Ltd, through Natural Gas World provides news, analysis and insight into natural gas matters from around the world and seeks to be a facilitator for the meaningful engagement needed between the key stakeholder segments: industry, policy-makers, academia, NGOs, and the public.
